00024 #include "configuration.h"
00025 #include <QFileDialog>
00026 
00027 Configuration::Configuration(QSettings *_settings, QWidget *parent)
00028  : QDialog(parent)
00029 {
00030         settings = _settings;
00031         writerContainer = new QWidget( this );
00032         writerUi.setupUi( writerContainer );
00033         writerContainer->hide();
00034 
00035         configContainer = new QWidget( this );
00036         configUi.setupUi( configContainer );
00037 
00038         lastnumber = 0;
00039 
00040         setWindowTitle( tr("Configuration") );
00041 
00042         connect( writerUi.okButton, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( save() ) );
00043         connect( configUi.okButton, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( save() ) );
00044         connect( writerUi.listWidget, SIGNAL( currentRowChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( viewChanged( int ) ) );
00045         connect( configUi.listWidget, SIGNAL( currentRowChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( viewChanged( int ) ) );
00046         connect( configUi.imageButton, SIGNAL( pressed() ), this, SLOT( changeImageDir() ) );
00047         connect( configUi.spinBox, SIGNAL( valueChanged ( int ) ), this, SLOT( numberChanged( int ) ) );
00048 
00049         settings->beginGroup( "general" );
00050         
00051         configUi.image->setText( settings->value("imagedir", "/" ).toString() );
00052         configUi.spinBox->setValue( settings->value( "numburners", 0).toInt() );
00053 
00054         settings->endGroup();
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 Configuration::~Configuration( void )
00059 {
00060 }
00061 
00062 void Configuration::save( void )
00063 {
00064         settings->beginGroup( "general" );
00065         settings->setValue( "imagedir", configUi.image->text() );
00066         settings->setValue( "numburners", configUi.spinBox->value() );
00067         settings->endGroup();
00068 
00069         if ( writerUi.listWidget->currentRow()  > 0 )
00070         {
00071                 settings->beginGroup( QString::number( writerUi.listWidget->currentRow() ) );
00072                 settings->setValue( "device", writerUi.devicefile->text() );
00073                 settings->setValue( "speed", writerUi.speed->value() );
00074                 settings->setValue( "eject", writerUi.eject->isChecked() );
00075                 settings->setValue( "simulation", writerUi.simulation->isChecked() );
00076                 settings->setValue( "options", writerUi.driveropts->text() );
00077                 settings->endGroup();
00078         }
00079         
00080         hide();
00081 
00082         emit finished();
00083 }
00084 
00085 void Configuration::viewChanged( int item )
00086 {
00087         if ( item == lastnumber )
00088                 return;
00089         
00090         if ( 0 == item )
00091         {
00092                 writerContainer->hide();
00093                 configContainer->show();
00094         } else
00095         {
00096                 writerContainer->show();
00097                 configContainer->hide();
00098         }
00099 
00100         if ( item > 0 )
00101         {
00102                 viewWriter( item );
00103         }
00104 
00105         lastnumber = item;
00106 
00107         writerUi.listWidget->setCurrentRow( item );
00108         configUi.listWidget->setCurrentRow( item );
00109 }
00110 
00111 void Configuration::viewWriter( int number )
00112 {
00113         if ( lastnumber > 0 )
00114         {
00115                 settings->beginGroup( QString::number( lastnumber ) );
00116                 settings->setValue( "device", writerUi.devicefile->text() );
00117                 settings->setValue( "speed", writerUi.speed->value() );
00118                 settings->setValue( "eject", writerUi.eject->isChecked() );
00119                 settings->setValue( "simulation", writerUi.simulation->isChecked() );
00120                 settings->setValue( "options", writerUi.driveropts->text() );
00121                 settings->endGroup();
00122         }
00123                 
00124         settings->beginGroup( QString::number( number ) );
00125         writerUi.devicefile->setText( settings->value( "device", "/dev/scd" ).toString() );
00126         writerUi.speed->setValue( settings->value( "speed", 0 ).toInt() );
00127         writerUi.eject->setChecked( settings->value( "eject", true ).toBool() );
00128         writerUi.simulation->setChecked( settings->value( "simulation", false ).toBool() );
00129         writerUi.driveropts->setText( settings->value( "options", "burnfree" ).toString() );
00130         settings->endGroup();
00131 }
00132 
00133 void Configuration::changeImageDir( void )
00134 {
00135         configUi.image->setText( QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory( this, tr("Select Image Directory") ) );
00136 }
00137 
00138 void Configuration::numberChanged( int number )
00139 {
00140         writerUi.listWidget->clear();
00141         configUi.listWidget->clear();
00142         writerUi.listWidget->addItem( tr("General") );
00143         configUi.listWidget->addItem( tr("General") );
00144                 
00145         for( int i = 1; i <= number; i++ )
00146         {
00147                 writerUi.listWidget->addItem( tr("CD Writer #") + QString::number( i ) );
00148                 configUi.listWidget->addItem( tr("CD Writer #") + QString::number( i ) );
00149         }
00150 
00151         writerUi.listWidget->setCurrentRow( 0 );
00152         configUi.listWidget->setCurrentRow( 0 );
00153 }
